Qualifiers.Applicability: Bay windows that meet specific design criteria
Qualifiers.Exclusions: Bay windows that do not meet the design criteria

Mandatory: Bottom of feature must be at least 18 inches above the floor joists
Exterior supports must be features like corbels and/or brackets rather than solid walls
At least 50% of the surface is glass

Explicit deviations: Bay windows that extend higher than the structure’s roof are considered to be dormers and count toward gross floor area
